name: ColonSurgery
title: Colon Surgery
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This grouping of value sets identifies patients who have  a colon surgery procedure.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have a colon surgery procedure.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes which represent colon surgery procedures.   Codes used are to be ICD10PCS, ICD9 or SNOMED-CT codes only.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)
